I live in Brooklyn, New York.
I am Cuban/Nicaraguan and I work in book publishing.

Whenever I come back from a trip, I check all of my photos...

In Europe, that was the first time I really felt the exhilaration you feel when you travel.
In Paris, I kissed Oscar Wilde's grave.

When I travel, I feel like the ultimate version of myself.
